Description:
Personal Qualities/Attitudes (Essential)Creates an inclusive culture where everyone's contribution is acknowledged and recognized.
Creates an environment committed to excellence and quality, and provides leadership around change for improvement in patient care.
Considers a range of factors in the planning process (e.g. costs, timing, customer needs, resources available, etc.).
Recognizes unsafe or potentially hazardous elements within work systems and procedures and acts to correct the situation.
Takes ownership of defined objectives and takes actions accordingly.
Adheres to the Kingdom’s laws and organization’s policies & procedures.
Encourages the team to promote their work throughout the organization.
Demonstrates and promotes loyalty to the organization at all times and in all situations.
Displays professional and civil behavior at all times.
Highly responsive, ethical and transparent behavior with a professional approach and willingness to be held accountable for results, including understanding and success in change management.  
Demonstrates inspirational approaches that drive and inspire other team members in the achievement of outcomes.
In all interactions, is guided by the needs of the patients, creating a partnership that is effective across the continuum of care.EducationNursingJob Details
